titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the East Hampton property outline 1978.169
titlestmt.author: Nicholas Pavlik
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-08-25 13:43:04 +0000.

did.abstract: Copies of a drawn outline of property lots in the town of East Hampton, Long Island, N.Y. The drawing represents property on or near East Hampton Street, Calf Pasture Lane (Ocean Avenue), Woods Lane, and Newtown Lane. For each lot representation, the outline contains the names of the individuals who owned the property throughout the period circa 1650 to 1890. The creator of the outline is not known.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. Formally accessioned in 1978.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); East Hampton property outline, 1978.169, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Minimally processed to the collection level.
